name: fofun
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: ffund(c0, c1, c2, wfo(c0, c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfun(c0))
-| wi(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wfun(c0))
-| wi(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c2))

body.origin: |- wi(wfo(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c2))

comment: An onto mapping is a function. (Contributed by NM, 29-Mar-2008.)
